attributes.action: take positive action to prevent the spread of headlice in schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are fed up with spending every weekend and holiday delousing our children and grandchildren to have them come home after the first day back in school with more. It is not healthy for the children, nor is the constant use of chemicals on their heads.  We want positive action to exclude children with headlice until they are clean, and to bring back the 'nit-nurse' for regular in-school inspections
